name: io.github.codeofaxel/kiln
description: MCP server for AI agents to control 3D printers (OctoPrint, Moonraker, Bambu Lab, Prusa Link, Elegoo). 230 tools for print farm automation, model search, STL slicing, job queuing, safety validation, fleet management, and manufacturing fulfillment.

environmentVariables.name: KILN_PRINTER_HOST
environmentVariables.description: URL of your 3D printer (OctoPrint, Moonraker, or Prusa Link)

environmentVariables.name: KILN_PRINTER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for your printer's REST API

environmentVariables.name: KILN_PRINTER_TYPE
environmentVariables.description: Printer type: octoprint, moonraker, bambu, prusalink, or elegoo

environmentVariables.name: KILN_BAMBU_IP
environmentVariables.description: IP address for Bambu Lab printer (MQTT/FTPS)

environmentVariables.name: KILN_BAMBU_SERIAL
environmentVariables.description: Serial number of Bambu Lab printer

environmentVariables.name: KILN_BAMBU_ACCESS_CODE
environmentVariables.description: Access code for Bambu Lab printer
